Package com.natwest.opendata.service.products

Class SMEServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.natwest.opendata.service.products.SMEServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseOpenDataService<UnsecuredSMELoan>, SMEService
    public class SMEServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SMEService
    The SMEServiceImpl class is an implementation of SMEService Interface. All methods pertaining to SME functionalities are implemented in this class.

    SMEServiceImpl is public class, an implementation, that get exposed to the developers or consumer of this SDK. Because SMEServiceImpl is public class, its methods are visible and can be consumed.

    Here are some more examples of how SMEService can be used: 

         Recommended way to use:
     OpenDataService openDataService=new OpenDataService(Environment.PROD);
      SMEService smeService=openDataService.getSMEService();
      smeService.getAllData();

    The class SMEServiceImpl includes methods for consuming various functionalities pertaining to SMEs open data SDK, for example getting all SMEs data as list, filtering SMEs based on properties such as SMEMarketingState, FeeCategory and FeeType.

    Exposed Methods:

    • getSMEByFilter
    • getSMEBySMEMarketingState
    • getSMEByFeeCategory
    • getAllData
    • exportAllDataAsCSV
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    SMEService, UnsecuredSMELoan, SMELoanFilterEnum

      • getAllData

        public java.util.List<UnsecuredSMELoan> getAllData()
                                            throws OpenDataSDKException

        Return the list of SME response. This method calls the private method getAllSMEs() and return the SME response list

        Specified by:

      • exportAllDataAsCSV

        public void exportAllDataAsCSV​(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String fileName)
                        throws OpenDataSDKException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Writes/Download the csv file of the SME open data SDK response on a specific location with specific file metricsEnumName, the current functionality download/Writes the entire response or select record of the response in comma separated values format (csv) This method returns void, and download/write csv file containing all the SME response.

        As soon as the function completed execution without any exception the data will be written in the given file metricsEnumName as AAA.csv.

        Specified by:
        exportAllDataAsCSV in interface BaseOpenDataService<UnsecuredSMELoan>
        Parameters:
        path -
        fileName -
        Throws:
        OpenDataSDKException
        java.io.IOException

      • exportAllDataAsCSV

        public void exportAllDataAsCSV()
                        throws OpenDataSDKException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Writes/Download the csv file of the SME open data SDK response, the current functionality download/Writes the entire response or select record of the response in comma separated values format (csv) This method returns void, and download/write csv file containing all the SME response.

        As soon as the function completed execution without any exception the data will be written in the file sme.csv.

        Specified by:
        exportAllDataAsCSV in interface BaseOpenDataService<UnsecuredSMELoan>
        Throws:
        OpenDataSDKException
        java.io.IOException

      • getSMEByFilter

        public java.util.List<UnsecuredSMELoan> getSMEByFilter​(@NonNull
                                                       @NonNull SMELoanFilterEnum filterName,
                                                       @NonNull
                                                       @NonNull java.lang.String filterValue)
        Filters SME response based on the attributes present in the SME response. filterName specified as the first parameter is the property in SME response and filterValue specified as the second parameter is the value of that property, against which the filtering is required This method returns filtered list.

        The Items in a list or array is seperated by ; instead of , to avoid conflict in csv file

        Specified by:
        getSMEByFilter in interface SMEService
        Parameters:
        filterName - Takes Enum SMELoanFilterEnum which has various filtering criteria
        filterValue - Takes string, which maps to the property value in SME service response
        Returns:
        filtered list of SME on which criteria are applied.
